trans-unit.source: Development and Runtime Architecture: BizTalk Adapter Service
trans-unit.target: Development and Runtime Architecture: BizTalk Adapter Service

trans-unit.source: This topic describes the different parts of the <token>lobconnect</token> in <token>af_integration_full</token>.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes the different parts of the <token>lobconnect</token> in <token>af_integration_full</token>.

trans-unit.source: Specifically:
trans-unit.target: Specifically:

trans-unit.source: BEFORE YOU BEGIN
trans-unit.target: BEFORE YOU BEGIN

trans-unit.source: There are two terms that are very important to understand:
trans-unit.target: There are two terms that are very important to understand:

trans-unit.source: An <token>lobtarget</token> is your on-premises Line-of-Business (LOB) system and the operations (like SELECT or INSERT) exposed to your client applications.
trans-unit.target: An <token>lobtarget</token> is your on-premises Line-of-Business (LOB) system and the operations (like SELECT or INSERT) exposed to your client applications.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <token>lobtarget</token> controls the LOB system connection URI (for example, mssql://SQLServerName:1433//myDatabase), the schema operation (for example, SELECT), and connection credentials (for example, myUserName and myPassword).
trans-unit.target: Specifically, the <token>lobtarget</token> controls the LOB system connection URI (for example, mssql://SQLServerName:1433//myDatabase), the schema operation (for example, SELECT), and connection credentials (for example, myUserName and myPassword).

trans-unit.source: An <token>lobtarget</token> can be used by multiple LOB systems and is hosted in a <token>lobrelay</token>.
trans-unit.target: An <token>lobtarget</token> can be used by multiple LOB systems and is hosted in a <token>lobrelay</token>.

trans-unit.source: An <token>lobrelay</token> is a URL that provides a connection to the cloud using <token>sb2</token> Relays.
trans-unit.target: An <token>lobrelay</token> is a URL that provides a connection to the cloud using <token>sb2</token> Relays.

trans-unit.source: A <token>lobrelay</token> acts as a container for the <token>lobtarget</token>s and can be used with multiple <token>lobtarget</token>s.
trans-unit.target: A <token>lobrelay</token> acts as a container for the <token>lobtarget</token>s and can be used with multiple <token>lobtarget</token>s.

trans-unit.source: A single <token>lobrelay</token> can be used with multiple <token>lobtarget</token>s.
trans-unit.target: A single <token>lobrelay</token> can be used with multiple <token>lobtarget</token>s.

trans-unit.source: This is cost-effective because you can connect to a LOB system and execute an operation using one endpoint.
trans-unit.target: This is cost-effective because you can connect to a LOB system and execute an operation using one endpoint.

trans-unit.source: There are restrictions based on the security model.
trans-unit.target: There are restrictions based on the security model.

trans-unit.source: As a best practice, group the same security method in one <token>lobrelay</token>.
trans-unit.target: As a best practice, group the same security method in one <token>lobrelay</token>.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the same <token>lobrelay</token> to host the <token>lobtarget</token>s that use message security.
trans-unit.target: For example, use the same <token>lobrelay</token> to host the <token>lobtarget</token>s that use message security.

trans-unit.source: When you create Line-of-Business (LOB) artifacts, these items are stored in a <token>azure_1</token> Storage account.
trans-unit.target: When you create Line-of-Business (LOB) artifacts, these items are stored in a <token>azure_1</token> Storage account.

trans-unit.source: Development
trans-unit.target: Development

trans-unit.source: Developing applications is done on-premises.
trans-unit.target: Developing applications is done on-premises.

trans-unit.source: On the Development environment, the application developer uses <token>vsprvs</token> to create the <token>af_integration_full</token> application that includes a Line-of-Business (LOB) component, like SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: On the Development environment, the application developer uses <token>vsprvs</token> to create the <token>af_integration_full</token> application that includes a Line-of-Business (LOB) component, like SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the Development environment utilizes the following components:
trans-unit.target: Specifically, the Development environment utilizes the following components:

trans-unit.source: <token>vsprvs</token> to create a <token>msgflow</token>
trans-unit.target: <token>vsprvs</token> to create a <token>msgflow</token>

trans-unit.source: The LOB system client libraries (if applicable)
trans-unit.target: The LOB system client libraries (if applicable)

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="57f25980-f745-4e8e-8a7e-4e0e87877dd5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How do I Start Configuring AppFabric Integration Solutions</link> provides information on creating a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="57f25980-f745-4e8e-8a7e-4e0e87877dd5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">How do I Start Configuring AppFabric Integration Solutions</link> provides information on creating a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="c5a79422-dad0-43ae-b2b4-99f0a8657ada" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Development: Creating an Application in Visual Studio</link> provides information on adding a LOB component to a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="c5a79422-dad0-43ae-b2b4-99f0a8657ada" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Development: Creating an Application in Visual Studio</link> provides information on adding a LOB component to a <token>msgflow_proj</token>.

trans-unit.source: Runtime
trans-unit.target: Runtime

trans-unit.source: The Runtime computer hosts the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime on-premises.
trans-unit.target: The Runtime computer hosts the <token>lobconnect</token> Runtime on-premises.

trans-unit.source: The <token>lobconnect</token> runtime does the following:
trans-unit.target: The <token>lobconnect</token> runtime does the following:

trans-unit.source: Manages on-premises to cloud connectivity.
trans-unit.target: Manages on-premises to cloud connectivity.

trans-unit.source: Supports multiple on-premises LOB systems using the adapters in the <token>bap</token>.
trans-unit.target: Supports multiple on-premises LOB systems using the adapters in the <token>bap</token>.

trans-unit.source: Routes to the different on-premises LOB systems using the adapters in the <token>bap</token>.
trans-unit.target: Routes to the different on-premises LOB systems using the adapters in the <token>bap</token>.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="355e839a-c2ca-48e2-bc2e-e3cd1ad32466" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Runtime: Service Bus Connect Service Runtime Components</link> provides information on setting up the Runtime environment and the different components.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="355e839a-c2ca-48e2-bc2e-e3cd1ad32466" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Runtime: Service Bus Connect Service Runtime Components</link> provides information on setting up the Runtime environment and the different components.

trans-unit.source: Process Flow
trans-unit.target: Process Flow

trans-unit.source: On-premises, a <token>msgflow</token> application contains a <token>lobtarget</token> and is deployed to the <token>af_integration</token> Portal.
trans-unit.target: On-premises, a <token>msgflow</token> application contains a <token>lobtarget</token> and is deployed to the <token>af_integration</token> Portal.

trans-unit.source: When deployed, the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: When deployed, the following occurs:

trans-unit.source: A <token>sb2</token> endpoint is created using your Service Namespace.
trans-unit.target: A <token>sb2</token> endpoint is created using your Service Namespace.

trans-unit.source: On the Runtime server on-premises, the Runtime monitors the <token>lobrelay</token> in <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: On the Runtime server on-premises, the Runtime monitors the <token>lobrelay</token> in <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: <link xlink:href="b11dcdab-b270-4568-9df8-83852826c441" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Deploying a Message Flow</link> provides the details on deployment.
trans-unit.target: <link xlink:href="b11dcdab-b270-4568-9df8-83852826c441" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Deploying a Message Flow</link> provides the details on deployment.

trans-unit.source: When a message is received by the <token>msgflow</token> application, the <token>sb2</token> endpoint passes the message to the <token>lobrelay</token> in <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: When a message is received by the <token>msgflow</token> application, the <token>sb2</token> endpoint passes the message to the <token>lobrelay</token> in <token>sb2</token>.

trans-unit.source: On the on-premises Runtime server, the following occurs:
trans-unit.target: On the on-premises Runtime server, the following occurs:

trans-unit.source: The runtime service confirms the <token>lobtarget</token> details in the configuration store hosted in the <token>azure_1</token> Storage account.
trans-unit.target: The runtime service confirms the <token>lobtarget</token> details in the configuration store hosted in the <token>azure_1</token> Storage account.

trans-unit.source: The runtime service executes the LOB operation (like INSERT or DELETE).
trans-unit.target: The runtime service executes the LOB operation (like INSERT or DELETE).

trans-unit.source: A runtime WCF web service is created for every <token>lobrelay</token>.
trans-unit.target: A runtime WCF web service is created for every <token>lobrelay</token>.

trans-unit.source: So if there are 15 <token>lobrelay</token>s in the <token>msgflow</token> application, there will be at least 15 runtime WCF web services.
trans-unit.target: So if there are 15 <token>lobrelay</token>s in the <token>msgflow</token> application, there will be at least 15 runtime WCF web services.

trans-unit.source: When the LOB operation completes on the on-premises LOB system, the response is sent back to the Runtime service, goes to the <token>sb2</token> endpoint and is passed to the <token>msgflow</token> application in <token>sb2</token>.
trans-unit.target: When the LOB operation completes on the on-premises LOB system, the response is sent back to the Runtime service, goes to the <token>sb2</token> endpoint and is passed to the <token>msgflow</token> application in <token>sb2</token>.
